newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy household confidence index slips in March.
newsitem.headline: Italy household confidence index slips in March.

text.p: Confidence in the economy among Italian households fell slightly in March, economic research institute Isco said in its latest survey.
Isco's March confidence index (1980=100) fell to 108.6 from 109.0 in February and compared to 108.1 in March 1996.
The survey showed families were fairly pessimistic about the state of the economy over the next 12 months but there was a modest rise in intentions to purchase durable goods.
